replies.body:
I equip my Blood Moon Shen
[http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_4.jpg](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_4.jpg)
with the Equip Card Whisper
[http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/january/jhin/img/Jhin_Passive.jpg](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/january/jhin/img/Jhin_Passive.jpg)
Now despair as they turn into Blood Moon Jhin!
[https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aTf8xfP1coo/WIut9QqMvYI/AAAAAAAAc7g/XQYCLx96ldEtaB6ncpEs6Eyrl6bXlAaYgCLcB/s1600/Jhin_Splash_2.jpg](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aTf8xfP1coo/WIut9QqMvYI/AAAAAAAAc7g/XQYCLx96ldEtaB6ncpEs6Eyrl6bXlAaYgCLcB/s1600/Jhin_Splash_2.jpg)
It's his Ionia Region version, débuting in the recent Lolémon Golden Sun & Blood Moon.
But both of them are Ionian...
Shen was first released in the Lolemon Light and Shadow, back in Gen 1.
Then shouldn't Blood Moon Shen be his Ionia version? Blood Moon Jhin can be a mega evolution or something.
no blood moon shen didnt come till gen 2 or gen 3 i cant rember
Holy crap i just noticed that the walls behind Shen look like wings.
it has to be traded first

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g67evcoJRSI

https://img.ifcdn.com/images/f266f7f3e3b3e6e6a4c408d8ddd09d146dbb195574a4f81da8ea55496ad02b38_1.jpg http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/ac8608e361fc87a9ff35ab70ab02b75f.jpg

http://static.fjcdn.com/pictures/Pokemon+of+legends_76c883_4452505.jpg

I like the artist who did the third one.
(づ ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)づ
We are quite in agreement on that one, indeed! There's an artist who doesn't skimp on..._nature's gifts_ when making a story.
The artist's comics cause people to be Au Naturel

>Au Naturel

One just gotta love it when people takes to their more _primal instincts_ every once in awhile - and otherwise appreciates all things that nature has provided.

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/9641baf8231787b32ece25310b693b0f.png

They say it's only healthy.

>Pokemon

Ah, yes, I forgot the topic. My bad - back on track!

http://www.dream-vessel.com/post/147250522823/99-pokemon-go-takes-you-to-new-places-patreon

Dear lord....

I know what this is....

>I know what this is....

Oh dear...

Sounds like there's another who also visits certain places on the web. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
oh yeah that's the illaoi comic isn't it. fun times.
It is indeed. The one where Illaoi _gotta catch'em all_.
It's a good one, too.
The guy makes a lot of nice stuff
If you got any EUNE connections, I can hook you up with what I got of his works in my collection. ;)
Don't we all...
:^) I approve of this.
I approve of your approval.
dat priority brave bird tho
Rest in peace Talonflame. He was a brave bird; he died young.
RIP Gale Wings, from S tier ability to dumpster in one gen :(
Haven't played Pokemon in a while, what did Sun and Moon do to Gale Wings?
Gale Wings now only works if you have full hp.

WHAT?!?!! THAT'S SO USELESS RIP TALONFLAME RIP PRIORITY FLARE BLITZ AND BRAVE BIRD. He'll get fucking checked by freaking stealth rock even though he was already horrible if you didn't have a spinner or defog. HOLY SHIT. Well, it'll allow Staraptor to get back into OU (maybe), but I mean geez.
Flare blitz never got priority. Gale Wings was a pretty overpowered ability anyways. However, in the change's defense, Talonflame was complete cancer in VGC.
*Insert Nunu Bot laugh*
RIP the only mon that could carry me to 1500 elo
http://i.imgur.com/9Gu70qS.jpg
Aw I should have changed the text to "When it thinks of its elo, it weeps loudly. Junglers that hear its cries will attack it from the brush."
I cant see it. Font too small. :'(

**Squints**

Why would you take the very very top of the picture from Stufful, but everything else from Cubone? Why would you do this??

(I mean, I know why, you probably wanted the Fluffy Ability but also wanted to use the split-evo design from Cubone... _but whyyyyy???_)

Has anyone ever made a "Pokémon" themed team?  I'm talking having {{champion:34}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:72}} on the same team (Why the drek is Anivia a blue block?!?) along with any other characters that could pass as Pokémon.

We've all forgotten the original Pokemon reference

{{champion:72}}  what happens when he stays in the bush too long?
SKAR-SKAR-SKARNER!
What does that Blood Moon theme even represent? Or is it just meant to be a "let's make the champion wear a mask, be coloured in red, and look badass"?

"Blood moon: The phenomenon whereby the moon in total eclipse appears reddish in color as it is illuminated by sunlight filtered and refracted by the earth's atmosphere."
_Which basically means Ao Shin should get one, ASAP._

It's a celebratory event, I'd imagine, to recognize this celestial event. Which I can only guess doesn't happen all that often.
I don't know when the next time this occurs is, but I'd say it's fairly soon(™), judging by the skin release facts.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Blood_Moon

In game old lore event.

Is this a case of "We remove the previously written 3 pages of entertaining read, and replace them with 2 sentences - no one is going to notice the changes to the lore"?

Also:
>Penumbral lunar eclipses will occur on March 23, 2016, September 16, 2016, and **February 11, 2017**. Penumbral eclipses are more difficult to observe because only part of the moon is eclipsed.

"February 11, 2017"...coincidence? Allthough not a complete eclipse, thus no _real_ "blood moon", I think the game and IRL events are related anyway.

Also, I have had the new Blood Moon skins estimated to be made available at around February 10 - I'd say that guess was rather spot-on.

Can't wait for 2033 now - the next occurance of a _super blood moon_.
Which champs will get Blood Moon skins then btw? Any known plans?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I doubt they are thinking that far ahead lol.

>lol

_I cringe at this expression in a post._

>I doubt they are thinking that far ahead.

Aww, and here I hoped for (at least) a legendary skin for my Lulu... :(

Ahh sorry let me re-tailor that for you.

>I doubt they are thinking that far ahead haha.

Also Demon themed lulu sounds cool.

We already got Wicked Lulu, so Bewitching/Little Devil Lulu is likely not something we'll ever see, but I do strongly lean towards something akin to a Kokiri (such as Saria with her fairy).

http://i.imgur.com/NVSk7fO.jpg
_I mean, I'd hit it...oh, I said that out loud, didn't I?_ :/

I could easily be persuaded to accept a less complex Pix in favour of a ton of SFX, particles and various movements (flies around Lulu in an upward spiral when using a healing potion etc. - have to stand still to do all of it, same as similar effects on other skins/champions).
http://orig08.deviantart.net/5917/f/2011/348/d/8/hey_listen_by_createvi-d3e723h.png

And when respawning, he flies around Lulu rampantly, sizzling furiously while Lulu does some apologetic talking (similar to the DT Tristana/Riggle interaction), and changes colour based on mood/situation.

As far as Pix complexity is concerned, DT Lulu is still the best - he even got some unique SFX there, as well as animations. Only missing a recall animation. :'(

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Blood_Moon

There ya go.
